modName: Halloween In Skyrim - Even More Pumpkins
summary: This mod adds more than 400 pumpkins, both carved and un-carved, to locations across the map, all exterior.  It adds a few pumpkin vines from which you can pick your own pumpkins--an ingredient you can use for both alchemy or cooking.  Pumpkins can also be found in some barrels.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#FF8000][b]Halloween In Skyrim - Even More Pumpkins[/b][/color][/size]
Last year, the people of Solitude grew a large crop of pumpkins and carved them into jack-o-lanterns. This year, the custom is spreading, and cities and towns all across Skyrim are decorating their doorstops with these agricultural lanterns.

This mod adds more than 400 pumpkins, both carved and un-carved, to locations across the map, all exterior. It adds a few pumpkin vines from which you can pick your own pumpkins--an ingredient you can use for both alchemy or cooking. Pumpkins can also be found in some barrels.

This mod is really just a second version of Halloween in Solitude. The reason I created a new file for it on the Nexus is that the name hardly seemed appropriate at this point.

You can see the old file, along with some videos, here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26014]Halloween in Solitude[/url]

[size=4][color=#FF8000][b]Installation Instructions[/b][/color][/size]
If you're installing this by hand, then extract all files into Skyrim's Data folder (for me, that's under C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data). If you already have existing meshes and textures folders, click Yes or Yes to All when it prompts you whether you want to copy the files into them.

Once you unpack the files, verify that the mod is activated by selecting "Data Files" from the loader screen, and ensuring that "HalloweenInSkyrim.esp" is checked.

You will have to disable this mod to make the pumpkins go away after Halloween.

I would recommend disabling last year's version, HalloweenInSolitude, if you happened to still be using that one. This mod includes everything the old one did.

[size=4][color=#FF8000][b]Video[/b][/color][/size]
Thanks to TheSpinia, Silverthorne11 (Skythorne) and Brodual for featuring this mod on YouTube!

[youtube]ogtm_uZAUqI[/youtube]
[youtube]yQIppyS5ImA[/youtube]
[youtube]VN-MwbJw2eU[/youtube]

[size=4][color=#FF8000][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
This mod was created by Deandra at the UESP (username Merilia at TESNexus since the name Deandra was taken). The pumpkins are based on a mesh and texture by Yughues aka Nobiax, which was packaged in a modder's resource by Tamira in her [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22018]New Plants 1_1[/url]. Please make sure to give credit to all of the people who have put work into these files if you choose to use them in a mod of your own, and respect their rights.
author: Deandra
